branchPaths.description: Talk to escaped characters, learn through dialogue

hubs.title: The Green Room
hubs.description: A neutral space where characters from different stories can meet

branchPaths.name: The Revisionists
branchPaths.description: Stories can and should be improved

hubs.title: The Archives
hubs.description: Where first drafts, cut scenes, and abandoned stories are stored

hubs.title: The Mainstage
hubs.description: The heart of the Understage—an enormous stage where all stories originated

endings.title: The Revised Draft
endings.description: You take the Editor's power and choose which stories survive. Reality and Understage remain separate, but you bear the burden.

endings.title: The Open Book
endings.description: The boundary dissolves peacefully. Fiction and reality merge. Hopeful but uncertain.

endings.title: The Closed Canon
endings.description: The Understage is sealed completely. Stories become static. Safe but melancholic.

endings.title: The Blank Page
endings.description: Both Understage and its deeper threat end. Reality with no more new stories. Tragic but peaceful.

endings.title: The Eternal Rehearsal
endings.description: The conflict continues indefinitely. You remain a Prompter forever. Ambiguous.
